item.description: Amateur Dog Show, Saturday, August 6th! 11:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Diamond Hill Park Diamond Hill Rd Rte. 114, Cumberland, RI Bring your family & furry friends for the fun. DOGS ARE WELCOME AT CUMBERLANDFEST ON SATURDAY ONLY Until 6:00 pm Demonstrations “Bully” Breed Dog Nosework Obedience Child Dog Bite Safety Freestyle (dancing) Amateur Dog Show Best Costumes – Tricks – Smile Sit & Stay (on command) Fetch & Drop (on command) Prettiest (girls Only) Most Handsome (boys Only) Prizes - Raffle - Free Gifts Exhibitors Service Dogs ● Rescue Groups ● Vendors SPECIAL EVENT – SUNDAY Aug 7th New England Disc (Frisbee) Dog Club will perform at 3:30pm For More Information: Call Judy at 401-339-0667 jquaglia3@cox.net
item.how_to_find_us: Pit bulls and white bully breed shirts
item.name: Cumberlandfest Celebrates Bully Breeds!
